gpt_comment: The consensus among forecasts shows a sunny day in Paris with an average temperature of 26.3°C, peaking at 30°C and dropping to a low of 20°C. There is no expectation of rain, making it a classic summer day in the city - perfect for a stroll along the Seine. If you're lucky, you might spot a monkey at the zoo enjoying the sunshine too!
